column4: Anyone have experience installing VMware Player on a fresh install of 11.04? I'm wondering what works best and is easiest to install
No. Can you easily download Windows images for it?
download windows images? you need to own the iso and mount it in virtualbox to install it
Can you store it and make copies at least?
So I could install Windows once, then make 3 copies and have 3 different Windows VMs?
So why can't you download an image (legality aside)?
that is the only barrier, legally
we don't encourage or condone illegal activities here
i'll let you figure that out, read the licenses that cover the software you wish to obtain
The application of the licenses depend on the country you're in
i'm not here to debate legalities, you know whether or not what you are doing is illegal, we just don't encourage those sort of activities here
Well, if you can't settle on whether it is or isn't legal, I don't know how you settle on encouraging or discouraging it. I imagine you let people make the suggestion to install VLC all the time
you asked about vm's and i gave you a response, i hope it helps you
